then.featuretextwithbullet: You can make two attacks on your turn
Cleric cantrips deal Wis mod extra damage

else.featuretextwithbullet: Deal 1d8 extra damage on one weapon attack each turn (see rules)
You are unaffected by nonmagical difficult terrain or plants and gain advantage vs magical plants that effect movement

effects.featuretextwithbullet: Within 60 feet of you, treat dim light as bright, darkness as dim light
You can lift, drag, push, and carry weight as if one size larger

accepteffects.featuretextwithbullet: 1/day you can channel to restore a proficiency/2 spell slot using a bonus action

entries.name: Archery
entries.previewtext: +2 to attack with ranged weapons

appendstoredstring.name: string_fightingstyle
appendstoredstring.text: - Archery: +2 to attack with ranged weapons

entries.name: Defense
entries.previewtext: +1 to AC while wearing armor

appendstoredstring.name: string_fightingstyle
appendstoredstring.text: - Defense: +1 to AC while wearing armor

entries.name: Dueling
entries.previewtext: +2 damage when using a single one-handed weapon

appendstoredstring.name: string_fightingstyle
appendstoredstring.text: - Dueling: +2 damage when using a single one-handed weapon

entries.name: Great Weapon Fighting
entries.previewtext: Reroll 1's and 2's on two-handed melee weapon damage dice

appendstoredstring.name: string_fightingstyle
appendstoredstring.text: - Great Weapon Fighting: Reroll 1's and 2's on two-handed melee weapon damage dice

entries.name: Protection
entries.previewtext: As a reaction, use your shield to impose disadvantage when an adjacent enemy attacks someone else

appendstoredstring.name: string_fightingstyle
appendstoredstring.text: - Protection: As a reaction, use your shield to impose disadvantage when an adjacent enemy attacks someone else

entries.name: Two-Weapon Fighting
entries.previewtext: Add ability modifier to off-hand damage

appendstoredstring.name: string_fightingstyle
appendstoredstring.text: - Two-Weapon Fighting: Add ability modifier to off-hand damage

entries.name: Commanderï¿½s Strike
entries.previewtext: You may have an ally make an attack with Superiority Die extra damage in place of one of your own attacks

entries.name: Disarming Attack
entries.previewtext: You can cause one creature you hit to take Superiority Die extra damage and must make a Str save or drop something they are holding

entries.name: Distracting Strike
entries.previewtext: You can cause one creature you hit to take Superiority Die extra damage and grant advantage to the next attack against it this round from someone else

entries.name: Evasive Footwork
entries.previewtext: You can gain Superiority Die to AC while moving

entries.name: Feinting Attack
entries.previewtext: You can spend a bonus action to grant your next attack against an adjacent foe advantage and Superiority Die extra damage

entries.name: Goading Attack
entries.previewtext: You can cause one creature you hit to take Superiority Die extra damage and must make a Wis save or have disadvantage on attacks against others this round

entries.name: Lunging Attack
entries.previewtext: You can cause your next melee attack to have 5 extra feet of range and deal Superiority Die extra damage

entries.name: Maneuvering Attack
entries.previewtext: You can cause one creature you hit to take Superiority Die extra damage and allow one ally to use a reaction to move half their speed without provoking from your target

entries.name: Menacing Attack
entries.previewtext: You can cause one creature you hit to take Superiority Die extra damage and must make a Wis save or be frightened this round

entries.name: Parry
entries.previewtext: You can use a reaction to take Superiority Die + Dex mod less damage from a melee attack

entries.name: Precision Attack
entries.previewtext: You can gain Superiority Die to an attack roll

entries.name: Pushing Attack
entries.previewtext: You can cause one creature you hit to take Superiority Die extra damage and if it is at most Large size must make a Str save or be pushed up to 15 feet

entries.name: Rally
entries.previewtext: You can give one creature Superiority Die + Cha mod temp hp

entries.name: Riposte
entries.previewtext: You can use a reaction when missed by a melee attack to make a melee attack back and deal Superiority Die extra damage

entries.name: Sweeping Attack
entries.previewtext: You can cause one creature adjacent to one you hit with a melee weapon to take Superiority Die damage if the same attack roll would hit

entries.name: Trip Attack
entries.previewtext: You can cause one creature you hit to take Superiority Die extra damage and if it is at most Large size must make a Str save or fall prone

entries.name: Breath of Winter
entries.previewtext: You can cast cone of cold for 6 ki points

entries.name: Clench of the North Wind
entries.previewtext: You can cast hold person for 3 ki points

entries.name: Eternal Mountain Defense
entries.previewtext: You can cast stoneskin on yourself for 5 ki points

entries.name: Fangs of the Fire Snake
entries.previewtext: You can use 1 ki point to cause your unarmed strikes to deal fire damage reach 10 feet further for a round, and you can deal 1d10 extra damage on those attacks for 1 ki point each

entries.name: Fist of Four Thunders
entries.previewtext: You can cast thunderwave for 2 ki points

entries.name: Fist of Unbroken Air
entries.previewtext: You can force a creature within 30 feet to make a Str save or take 3d10 bludgeoning damage and pushed 20 feet for 2 ki points (see rules)

entries.name: Flames of the Phoenix
entries.previewtext: You can cast fireball for 4 ki points

entries.name: Gong of the Summit
entries.previewtext: You can cast shatter for 3 ki points

entries.name: Mist Stance
entries.previewtext: You can cast gaseous form on yourself for 4 ki points

entries.name: Ride the Wind
entries.previewtext: You can cast fly on yourself for 4 ki points

entries.name: River of Hungry Flame
entries.previewtext: You can cast wall of fire for 5 ki points

entries.name: Rush of the Gale Spirits
entries.previewtext: You can cast gust of wind for 2 ki points

entries.name: Shape the Flowing River
entries.previewtext: You can freeze, melt and shape water/ice in a 30 foot cube for 1 ki point (see rules)

entries.name: Sweeping Cinder Strike
entries.previewtext: You can cast burning hands for 2 ki points

entries.name: Water Whip
entries.previewtext: You can use a bonus action to force a creature within 30 feet to make a Dex save or take 3d10 bludgeoning damage and either knocked prone or pulled 25 feet (see rules)

entries.name: Wave of Rolling Earth
entries.previewtext: You can cast wall of stone for 6 ki points

entries.name: Careful Spell
entries.previewtext: You can cause up to Cha mod creatures to pass your spell's save for 1 sorcery point

entries.name: Distant Spell
entries.previewtext: You can double the range of a spell, or give a touch spell a range of 30 feet for 1 sorcery point

entries.name: Empowered Spell
entries.previewtext: You can reroll up to Cha mod damage dice for 1 sorcery point and can use this with other metamagic

entries.name: Extended Spell
entries.previewtext: You can double the duration of a spell that is at least a minute long for 1 sorcery point

entries.name: Heightened Spell
entries.previewtext: You can give one target disadvantage against a spell's save for 3 sorcery points

entries.name: Quickened Spell
entries.previewtext: You can use a bonus action to cast a spell normally cast as an action for 2 sorcery points

entries.name: Subtle Spell
entries.previewtext: You can cast without somatic or verbal components for 1 sorcery point

entries.name: Twinned Spell
entries.previewtext: You can cast a single target non-self spell on two targets for 1 sorcery point per level

entries.name: Agonizing Blast
entries.previewtext: Your eldritch blast does Cha mod extra damage

entries.name: Armor of Shadows
entries.previewtext: You don't use a spell slot when casting mage armor on yourself

entries.name: Ascendant Step
entries.previewtext: You don't use a spell slot when casting levitate on yourself

entries.name: Beast Speech
entries.previewtext: You don't use a spell slot when casting speak with animals

entries.name: Beguiling Influence
entries.previewtext: You are proficient in deception and persuasion

entries.name: Bewitching Whispers
entries.previewtext: You can cast compulsion as a warlock spell 1/day

entries.name: Book of Ancient Secrets
entries.previewtext: You can cast any class's rituals from your Book of Shadows (see rules)

entries.name: Chains of Carceri
entries.previewtext: You don't use a spell slot when casting hold monster on elementals, fiends, and celestials

entries.name: Devil's Sight
entries.previewtext: You can see through 120 feet of darkness, even magical darkness

entries.name: Dreadful Word
entries.previewtext: You can cast confusion as a warlock spell 1/day

entries.name: Eldritch Sight
entries.previewtext: You don't use a spell slot when casting detect magic

entries.name: Eldritch Spear
entries.previewtext: Your eldritch blast has a range of 300 feet

entries.name: Eyes of the Rune Keeper
entries.previewtext: You can read any written language

entries.name: Fiendish Vigor
entries.previewtext: You don't use a spell slot when casting a level one false life on yourself

entries.name: Gaze of Two Minds
entries.previewtext: You can see/hear/etc through the senses of a creature you touch (see rules)

entries.name: Lifedrinker
entries.previewtext: You deal Cha mod extra necrotic damage with your pact weapon

entries.name: Mask of Many Faces
entries.previewtext: You don't use a spell slot when casting disguise self

entries.name: Master of Myriad Forms
entries.previewtext: You don't use a spell slot when casting alter self

entries.name: Minions of Chaos
entries.previewtext: You can cast conjure elemental as a warlock spell 1/day

entries.name: Mire the Mind
entries.previewtext: You can cast slow as a warlock spell 1/day

entries.name: Misty Visions
entries.previewtext: You don't use a spell slot when casting silent image

entries.name: One with Shadows
entries.previewtext: You can use your action to become invisible until you act or move when in shadow

entries.name: Otherworldly Leap
entries.previewtext: You don't use a spell slot when casting jump on yourself

entries.name: Repelling Blast
entries.previewtext: You can push creatures you hit with eldritch blast ten feet

entries.name: Sculptor of Flesh
entries.previewtext: You can cast polymorph as a warlock spell 1/day

entries.name: Sign of Ill Omen
entries.previewtext: You can cast bestow curse as a warlock spell 1/day

entries.name: Thief of Five Fates
entries.previewtext: You can cast bane as a warlock spell 1/day

entries.name: Thirsting Blade
entries.previewtext: You can make two attacks with your pact weapon as an action

entries.name: Visions of Distant Realms
entries.previewtext: You don't use a spell slot when casting arcane eye

entries.name: Voice of the Chain Master
entries.previewtext: You can speak through, sense through, and telepathically communicate with your familiar

entries.name: Whispers of the Grave
entries.previewtext: You don't use a spell slot when casting speak with dead

entries.name: Witch Sight
entries.previewtext: You can see through magical alterations or deceptions to a creature's actual form

entries.name: Aspect of the Moon
entries.previewtext: You are immune to sleep and do not need to do so

entries.name: Cloak of Flies
entries.previewtext: 1/rest you can create a 5 foot aura as a bonus action that deals Cha mod poison damage to creatures that start there and grants you disadvantage on Cha checks / adv on Intimidate (see rules)

entries.name: Eldritch Smite
entries.previewtext: You can deal 1d8 force damage + 1d8 per level of the spell slot you use up to a creature you hit and if not larger than huge, knock it prone (1/turn)

entries.name: Ghostly Gaze
entries.previewtext: 1/rest you can concentrate to gain darkvision and see through 30 feet of objects for 1 minute as an action

entries.name: Gift of the Depths
entries.previewtext: 1/day you can cast water breathing, you have a swim speed, and can breathe water

entries.name: Gift of the Ever-Living Ones
entries.previewtext: Healing is maximized on you if your familiar is within 100 feet

entries.name: Grasp of Hadar
entries.previewtext: Your eldritch blast can pull targets 10 feet

entries.name: Improved Pact Weapon
entries.previewtext: You can conjure bows and crossbows, your conjured weapons are +1, and you can use them as a focus

entries.name: Lance of Lethargy
entries.previewtext: Your eldritch blast can slow a creature by 10 feet for 1 round

entries.name: Maddening Hex
entries.previewtext: You can deal Cha mod psychic damage to your curse target and adjacent creatures you can see as a bonus action (see rules)

entries.name: Relentless Hex
entries.previewtext: You can teleport adjacent to your curse target, up to 30 feet, as a bonus action

entries.name: Shroud of Shadow
entries.previewtext: You no longer need to use a spell slot to cast invisibility and you learn the spell if you didn't already know it

entries.name: Tomb of Levistus
entries.previewtext: 1/rest you can gain warlock level x 10 temp hp before being hit by an attack as a reaction, but are incapacitated, immobile and vulnerable to fire until the end of your next turn (see rules)

entries.name: Trickster's Escape
entries.previewtext: 1/day you can cast freedom of movement

entries.name: Pact of the Chain
entries.previewtext: You gain a special familiar which you can command to attack (see rules)

entries.name: Pact of the Blade
entries.previewtext: You gain the ability to conjure a magical weapon (see rules)

entries.name: Pact of the Tome
entries.previewtext: You can cast three cantrips from any class (see rules)

entries.name: Infernal Legacy
entries.previewtext: Thaumaturgy, hellish rebuke at 3rd lvl, darkness at 5th

effects.featuretextwithbullet: Can cast the thaumaturgy cantrip. At 3rd level, hellish rebuke (1/day). At 5th level, darkness (1/day) (use Cha for DCs)

entries.name: Devil's Tongue
entries.previewtext: Vicious mockery, charm person at 3rd lvl, enthrall at 5th

effects.featuretextwithbullet: Can cast the vicious mockery cantrip. At 3rd level, charm person [as 2nd lvl](1/day). At 5th level, enthrall (1/day) (use Cha for DCs)

entries.name: Hellfire
entries.previewtext: Thaumaturgy, burning hands at 3rd lvl, darkness at 5th

effects.featuretextwithbullet: Can cast the thaumaturgy cantrip. At 3rd level, burning hands [as 2nd lvl](1/day). At 5th level, darkness (1/day) (use Cha for DCs)

entries.name: Winged
entries.previewtext: Fly: 30 feet

entries.name: Banishing Arrow
entries.previewtext: Cha save or be removed from play for 1 round. +2d6 force damage at 18th level

entries.name: Beguiling Arrow
entries.previewtext: +2d6 psychic damage and save vs Wis or charmed by a creature you choose within 30 feet for 1 round. +2d6 psychic damage at 18th level

entries.name: Bursting Arrow
entries.previewtext: 2d6 force damage to all creatures within 10 feet of target. +2d6 force damage at 18th level

entries.name: Enfeebling Arrow
entries.previewtext: +2d6 necrotic damage and save vs Con or deal half damage for 1 round. +2d6 necrotic damage at 18th level

entries.name: Grasping Arrow
entries.previewtext: +2d6 poison damage, -10 feet to speed, and 2d6 slashing damage 1/turn when it moves (see rules). +2d6 poison damage and slashing increases by +2d6 at 18th level

entries.name: Piercing Arrow
entries.previewtext: Deal weapon damage +1d6 piercing damage to creatures in a 30 foot line, Dex save for half. +1d6 piercing damage at 18th level

entries.name: Seeking Arrow
entries.previewtext: Deal weapon damage +1d6 force damage and learn the location of your target, Dex save for half damage only (see rules). +1d6 force damage at 18th level

entries.name: Shadow Arrow
entries.previewtext: +2d6 psychic damage and save vs Wis or blinded outside of 5 feet for 1 round. +2d6 psychic damage at 18th level

entries.name: Manta Glide
entries.previewtext: You can glide forward twice as far as you descend and you treat falls as 100 ft less

entries.name: Nimble Climber
entries.previewtext: You can climb your speed

entries.name: Underwater Adaptation
entries.previewtext: You can swim your speed and breath under water

entries.name: Grappling Appendages
entries.previewtext: You can make a 1d6 + Str mod bludgeoning tentacle attack as an action and then grapple with it as a bonus action if you hit (see rules)

entries.name: Carapace
entries.previewtext: When not in heavy armor you have +1 armor class

entries.name: Acid Spit
entries.previewtext: Con mod/day, as an action, deal 2d10 acid damage to a creature within 30 feet unless it makes a Dex save. At 11th level, 3d10. At 17th level, 4d10

entries.name: Darkvision
entries.previewtext: Within 60 feet of you, treat dim light as bright, darkness as dim light

entries.name: Skill
entries.previewtext: One skill proficiency

entries.name: Favored Enemy
entries.previewtext: Gain advantage on survival and Int checks concerning your chosen creature type, and you know a language spoken by those creatures

entries.name: Favored Foe
entries.previewtext: Proficiency/day you can concentrate to mark a creature you hit for a minute, dealing 1d4 extra damage 1/turn

entries.name: Natural Explorer
entries.previewtext: Gain advantage on Wis and Int checks concerning your chosen terrain, and bonuses while traveling through that terrain (see rules)

entries.name: Canny
entries.previewtext: Learn two extra languages and gain expertise in a skill

entries.name: Primeval Awareness
entries.previewtext: You can sacrifice a spell slot as an action to determine if certain creature types are within 1 mile (6 miles if favored terrain) (see rules)

entries.name: Primal Awareness
entries.previewtext:
Learn extra spells which you can cast for free 1/day:
 3-speak with animals, 5-beast sense, 9-speak with plants, 13-locate creature, 17-commune with nature

entries.name: Hide in Plain Sight
entries.previewtext: You can take 1 minute to give yourself +10 to stealth for as long as you do not move or act

entries.name: Primal Awareness
entries.previewtext: Proficiency/day turn invisible until your next turn as a bonus action

sharedclassfeaturemenus.name: Gift of the Chromatic Dragon
sharedclassfeaturemenus.previewtext: Prof/day you can resist elemental damage as a reaction and 1/day you can cause a weapon to deal 1d4 elemental damage for 1 minute as a bonus action.

sharedclassfeaturemenus.name: Gift of the Gem Dragon
sharedclassfeaturemenus.previewtext: Prof/day, as a reaction, you can deal 2d8 force damage and push 10 ft to a creature within 10 ft that damages you (str save for half), and you gain +1 to either Int, Wis, or Cha

sharedclassfeaturemenus.name: Gift of the Metallic Dragon
sharedclassfeaturemenus.previewtext: Prof/day give yourself or adjacent ally +prof to AC as a reacion and 1/day you can cast cure wounds and the spell is known to you.

menuentries.name: Blessed Warrior
menuentries.previewtext: Gain two cleric cantrips

appendstoredstring.name: string_fightingstyle
appendstoredstring.text: - Blessed Warrior: Gain two cleric cantrips

menuentries.name: Blind Fighting
menuentries.previewtext: 10 feet of blindsight

menuentries.name: Druidic Warrior
menuentries.previewtext: Gain two druid cantrips

appendstoredstring.name: string_fightingstyle
appendstoredstring.text: - Druidic Warrior: Gain two druid cantrips

menuentries.name: Interception
menuentries.previewtext: You can use a weapon or shield to deflect 1d10 + proficiency damage from an adjacent creature, as a reaction

appendstoredstring.name: string_fightingstyle
appendstoredstring.text: - Interception: You can use a weapon or shield to deflect 1d10 + proficiency damage from an adjacent creature, as a reaction

menuentries.name: Superior Technique
menuentries.previewtext: Gain a superiority die and a battle master maneuver

appendstoredstring.name: string_fightingstyle
appendstoredstring.text: - Interception: Gain a superiority die and a battle master maneuver

menuentries.name: Thrown Weapon Fighting
menuentries.previewtext: You deal 2 extra damage with thrown weapons and can draw them for free when attacking

appendstoredstring.name: string_fightingstyle
appendstoredstring.text: - Thrown Weapon Fighting: You deal 2 extra damage with thrown weapons and can draw them for free when attacking

menuentries.name: Unarmed Fighting
menuentries.previewtext: You deal 1d4 bludgeon damage to a grappled foe when your turn begins and your unarmed attacks deal 1d6 damage, 1d8 without shield/weapon

appendstoredstring.name: string_fightingstyle
appendstoredstring.text: - Unarmed Fighting: You deal 1d4 bludgeon damage to a grappled foe when your turn begins and your unarmed attacks deal 1d6 damage, 1d8 without shield/weapon

menuentries.name: Ambush
menuentries.previewtext: You can gain Superiority Die to initiative or stealth

menuentries.name: Bait and Switch
menuentries.previewtext: You may grant Superiority Die to AC to yourself or adjacent ally for a round and swap places with them

menuentries.name: Brace
menuentries.previewtext: You may attack a creature that enters your reach with Superiority Die extra damage, as a reaction

menuentries.name: Commanding Pressence
menuentries.previewtext: You can gain Superiority Die to performance, intimidate, or persuasion

menuentries.name: Grappling Strike
menuentries.previewtext: You can grapple using a bonus action gaining Superiority Die to the check, when you hit with an attack

menuentries.name: Quick Toss
menuentries.previewtext: You may throw a held or sheathed weapon as a bonus action with Superiority Die extra damage

menuentries.name: Tactical Assessment
menuentries.previewtext: You can gain Superiority Die to history, investigation, or insight

menuentries.name: Bond of the Talisman
menuentries.previewtext: Proficiency/day the creature with your talisman can teleport to you as an action, and you can also teleport to them

menuentries.name: Eldritch Mind
menuentries.previewtext: You gain advantage vs concentration

menuentries.name: Far Scribe
menuentries.previewtext: You can communicate via sending with those who enter their name in your tome (see rules)

menuentries.name: Gift of the Protectors
menuentries.previewtext: 1/day you restore 1 hp to those who enter their name in your tome who would go unconcious (see rules)

menuentries.name: Investment of the Chain Master
menuentries.previewtext: Your familiar can attack as a bonus action, has magical attacks, 40 foot swim or fly speed, uses your DC, and you can give it resist all as a reaction

menuentries.name: Protection of the Talisman
menuentries.previewtext: Proficiency/day the talisman grants 1d4 to a failed save

menuentries.name: Rebuke of the Talisman
menuentries.previewtext: You can push 10 feet and inflict proficiency psychic damage to a creature within 30 feet that strikes someone with your talisman, as a reaction

menuentries.name: Undying Servitude
menuentries.previewtext: 1/day you can cast animate dead

menuentries.name: Pact of the Talisman
menuentries.previewtext: You gain a talisman that proficiency/day grants 1d4 to a failed ability check

menuentries.name: Seeking Spell
menuentries.previewtext: You can reroll a spell attack for 2 sorcery points

menuentries.name: Transmuted Spell
menuentries.previewtext: You can change damage type for 1 sorcery point (see rules)
